name: Salesforce JB Custom Activity
description: Create a Journey Builder Custom Activity for making an http request.

APP_NAME.description: Name of the Heroku application above (either Heroku default or your custom name)

KEY.description: Application extension key - this must match exactly what is entered into the Journey Builder creation screen.

CA_IMG_40.description: Full https URL for the 40x40 pixel Custom Activity image.

CA_IMG_15.description: Full https URL for the 15x15 pixel Custom Activity image.

ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION.description: Description of what the Custom Activity does (advanced)

CA_EDIT_URL.description: https URL of the edit window page (template can be found in this github repo)

EDIT_HEIGHT.description: Height of the Custom Activity edit window in pixels. (advanced)

EDIT_WIDTH.description: Height of the Custom Activity edit window in pixels. (advanced)
